description: This file defines the utility function 'downloadBlob' which facilitates downloading a Blob object as a file with a specified filename. It creates a temporary object URL for the Blob, dynamically creates and clicks an anchor element to trigger the download, and then cleans up the URL and DOM elements.

methods.name: downloadBlob(blob, filename)
methods.description: Downloads a Blob object as a file with the specified filename by creating a temporary download link, clicking it programmatically, and cleaning up.
